thread.title: Kristi Drew Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner and Global Account Leader

author: cnbc.com
title: Kristi Drew Joins Korn Ferry as Senior Client Partner and Global Account Leader
text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) today announced that Kristi Drew has joined the firm as Senior Client Partner and Global Account Leader in its Life Sciences and Financial practices. She will be based in the firm’s Princeton office.
Ms. Drew has more than two decades of consulting experience in talent management and development strategies, total rewards strategy, employee engagement, M&A integration activities, and risk mitigation. She has experience leading global teams across various practice lines, working with Fortune 500 organizations, state, and union groups.
Prior to Korn Ferry, Ms. Drew was a Senior Vice President and Partner at Aon. Previously, she worked at Prudential, Towers Perrin and Lord Abbett.
“Kristi is an industry leader with a breadth of global experience working across various industry sectors,” said Doug Charles, President of the Americas, Korn Ferry. “Her leadership experience and strong record of client service will be a great benefit to our Life Sciences and Financial clients. We are excited to have her join the firm.”
Ms. Drew holds an M.B.A. and a B.S. in Business Management from Fairleigh Dickinson University. She has been recognized by Consulting Magazine as Top 25 Consultant, by the Morris County Chamber of Commerce as a Leader in Business, and by NJBIZ as one of New Jersey’s Best 50 Women in Business for business and community leadership.
About Korn Ferry
Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help companies design their organization – the structure, the roles and responsibilities, as well as how they compensate, develop and motivate their people. As importantly, we help organizations select and hire the talent they need to execute their strategy. Our approximately 7,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries.
